name: 郭美純
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation & Get to know the class
Week 2: Unit 1 Your day
Week 3: Unit 2 Musical tastes
Week 4: Worksheet exercise (based on Unit 1&2)
Week 5: Unit 3 Fine cuisine
Week 6: Unit 4 Survival
Week 7: Worksheet exercise (based on Unit 3&4)
Week 8: Review 1-4
Week 9: Mid Term Examination (unit 1-4)
Week 10: Grouping oral presentation
Week 11: Oral Presentation
Week 12: Oral Presentation
Week 13: Oral Presentation
Week 14: Oral Presentation
Week 15: Unit 5 Life events
Week 16: Unit 6 Destinations
Week 17: Review Unit 5-6
Week 18: Final Exam (unit 5-6)
